第2 个2 级标题的 二级标题
Press your mind gracefully, which is powered by nuxt.js 3.0 and nuxt.js content 2.0.
Make sure to install the dependencies:

# yarn
yarn install

# npm
npm install

# pnpm
pnpm install --shamefully-hoist
SSG Mode is static page mode. All pages are genereated by nuxt 3. And, thid site can be deploy at nginx static page server.
